[b]Plot[/b]

American Chopper profiles the lives of New York natives Paul Teutul Sr. and his son Paul Jr. of Orange County Choppers, creators of the world's most outrageous custom motorcycles. American Chopper captures the day-to -day drama of this volatile father-and-son team as they battle impossible deadlines and push the envelope of motorcycle design and fabrication. From heated arguments and humorous antics to creative setbacks and artistic triumphs. American Chopper celebrates one family's struggle to achieve the American Dream [icon=note6]
